extensionDescription.message: Support trans people and improving your experience on Twitter

actionReportTransphobe.description: Context menu action for reporting a transphobe.

searchTweets.description: Context menu action for searching a user's tweets for gender-related keywords.

actionAppealLabel.description: Context menu action for appealing a user's label.

actionRerunSetup.description: Context menu action for running the setup process again.

actionUpdateDatabase.description: Context menu action for updating the extension's database.

actionModerateReports.description: Context menu action to review and moderate user reports.

actionOptions.description: Context menu action to change extension options.

reportReasonInstructions.message:
üçÖ Report @$ID$

You can provide reasoning for your report here, if you think it may help verify your report, including links to tweets, etc. Even if it's obvious please note down what you see, since people can edit their profiles/delete tweets.
reportReasonInstructions.description: Instructions given to the user on providing a report reason.

userAlreadyRed.message: @$ID$ is already reported, there is no need to report again. üçÖü•´
userAlreadyRed.description: Error message when you try to report someone who is already marked.

sendReportButton.description: Button that sends the report in.

authorizationInvalid.message: Authorization invalid, please log in again.
authorizationInvalid.description: Error message when failing to send a command to the server because the credentials are wrong.

invalidReportTarget.description: Error message shown when trying to report something that is not a valid target (user).

invalidAppealTarget.description: Error message shown when trying to appeal something that is not a valid target (user).

invalidTarget.description: Error message shown when trying to execute an action on something that is not a valid target (user).

databaseDownloading.description: Tooltip shown when starting to download the database.

databaseUpdated.description: Success tooltip message when the database was downloaded.

databaseUpdateFailed.description: Error message when the database update fails.

error.example: TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'cloneNode')

genericError.description: Generic error message when something fails.

error.example: TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'cloneNode')

resendingReport.description: Tooltip message shown when re-sending a pending report.

sendingReport.description: Tooltip message shown when sending a new report.

reportReceived.description: Tooltip message shown when a report was accepted by the server.

reportSubmissionFailed.description: Tooltip error message shown when a report could not be submitted.

sendingAppeal.description: Tooltip message shown when sending a new appeal.

appealReceived.description: Tooltip message shown when an appeal was accepted by the server.

appealSubmissionFailed.description: Tooltip error message shown when an appeal could not be submitted.

invalidReportType.description: Error message shown if an unexpected report type (not report or appeal) was given.

nothingToAppeal.description: Message shown to non-moderators who try to appeal a user who isn't marked.

extensionContextInvalidated.message: Soupcan was unloaded or refreshed, and will not work until the page is refreshed. Would you like to refresh the page now?
extensionContextInvalidated.description: Error message to show when the extension was reloaded but the page hasn't been reloaded. (This causes the extension to stop working)

transphobeCounter.description: Heading for the panel that counts transphobes in a user's followers/following pages.

scrollInstructions.description: Instructions for counting more transphobes in followers/following pages

toast_label_tip.description: Header shown for a tooltip when an action has been taken

toast_label_info.description: Header shown for a tooltip when information is displayed to the user

toast_label_success.description: Header shown for a tooltip when an action succeeds

toast_label_warning.description: Header shown for a tooltip when an invalid action is taken

toast_label_alert.description: Header shown for a tooltip when a failure occurs

toast_label_confirm.description: Header shown for a tooltip when an yes/no response is required

toast_label_confirmOk.description: Label for confirmation/yes button in the confirmation dialog

toast_label_confirmCancel.description: Label for cancel/no button in the confirmation dialog

toast_label_async.description: Label for when waiting on a request sent to the server

serverFailure.description: Short popup message that displays when an action was not successfully processed by the Soupcan server

loadingReasons.description: Popup message shown to moderators who are waiting for the report reasons to show up.

noReasons.message: No report reasons found. This could be because they were marked red before the reason feature was created, or before reports were logged.
noReasons.description: Message that shows up to moderators when no reasons appear after they click to see report reasons.
